about_the_game:
Just when you thought you had it all figured out, you realize you're just a tiny bug in the vastness of the universe. With this technology, you’ll have access to even more realities than you thought were possible. Raid planets from multiple realities to gather the most resources per run.

This DLC unlocks alternate realities 101 through 1000.

Note: this content will not be available until defeating the second boss, on the sixteenth planet, Eridani.
detailed_description:
Just when you thought you had it all figured out, you realize you're just a tiny bug in the vastness of the universe. With this technology, you’ll have access to even more realities than you thought were possible. Raid planets from multiple realities to gather the most resources per run.

This DLC unlocks alternate realities 101 through 1000.

Note: this content will not be available until defeating the second boss, on the sixteenth planet, Eridani.
name: Idle Expanse - Reality Shifter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 4.20 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound

short_description: This DLC unlocks alternate realities 101 through 1000.
